Text:
Patch not working :/ When the patch is run from a command prompt, it reports an error finding the proper offset in the .dll to patch.

Any ideas?

Works fine for me on W8 x64. You need to block all apps from ManicTime with your firewall, esle you're dead.

@Anacondaz: Would you happen to have a new keygen for 2.4.0.3? The old one doesn't work with this new version. Cheers
